section_id: ## Part II: Time Discretization Error Bounds

hints.label: thm-time-discretization-error-target
hints.title: Time Discretization Error for Invariant Measure (Target)
hints.content:
175: :label: thm-time-discretization-error-target
176: 
177: Let $\nu_N^{\text{cont}}$ be the quasi-stationary distribution of the continuous-time Langevin dynamics and let $\nu_N^{\Delta t}$ be the QSD of the discrete-time BAOAB chain with step size $\Delta t$. For any observable $\phi \in C^4$, we have:
178: 
179: $$
180: \left| \mathbb{E}_{\nu_N^{\Delta t}} [\phi] - \mathbb{E}_{\nu_N^{\text{cont}}} [\phi] \right| \leq C_{\text{disc}} \cdot \|\phi\|_{C^4} \cdot (\Delta t)^2
181: $$
182: 
183: where $C_{\text{disc}}$ depends on $\gamma$, $\sigma$, and the energy bounds.

hints.title: BAOAB Weak Error
hints.content:
197: :label: lem-baoab-weak-error
198: 
199: The BAOAB integrator for the overdamped Langevin equation satisfies:
200: 
201: $$
202: \mathbb{E}[\phi(Z_k)] = \mathbb{E}[\phi(Z(k\Delta t))] + O((\Delta t)^2)
203: $$

hints.label: lem-baoab-invariant-measure-error
hints.title: BAOAB Invariant Measure Error
hints.content:
224: :label: lem-baoab-invariant-measure-error
225: 
226: Let $\nu^{\text{cont}}$ be the invariant measure of the continuous-time Langevin dynamics and let $\nu^{\Delta t}$ be the invariant measure of the BAOAB chain. For Lipschitz observables $\phi$ with constant $L_\phi$:
227: 
228: $$
229: \left| \mathbb{E}_{\nu^{\Delta t}} [\phi] - \mathbb{E}_{\nu^{\text{cont}}} [\phi] \right| \leq C_{\text{inv}} \cdot L_\phi \cdot \Delta t
230: $$
231: 
232: where $C_{\text{inv}}$ depends on $\gamma$, $\sigma$, $\|U\|_{C^4}$, and moment bounds.
